comment.author: 35313370@N08
comment._content: Yep, been there, done that. Dad wanted to revisit the place he had been when a boy at summer camp. What a horrible experience that day. I was so frightened for Daddy. We climbed without adequate clothing -- and by the time we got to the top the weather had dropped 30 degrees and it was sleeting. I knew Daddy was not going to be the same after that climb. And he wasn't. I'm glad we did it for him but god I wish it had been a balmy day!

comment.realname: Keene Public Library and the Historical Society of Cheshire County
comment.author: 25960495@N06
comment._content:
Ah, but on a nice day, this can be a wonderful beautiful climb! I do it as often as I can. I love it up there.
Cheers,
BJ at KPL
